::Zardus/DevilDuer::

Zardus is slammed into a tree by Kit's shot, thereby avoiding Sniper's 
charge. He groans, standing up and firing a shot back at Kit.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
DevilDuer fires several more shots into Striker's back before the maximals 
rolls over and shoots back.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Bloodystrike runs into the battle, firing his gun at Sniper.
